name: Speedy Industry
description: Manage a robot factory by making sure each robot that drops onto the conveyor belt matches what the dropper indicates. If it doesn't, pick it up with your mouse and drop it in the orange trash bin above.  Otherwise, let it fall into the blue bin at the end of the belt. To speed up production, click on the red button on the wall. Putting a robot in the correct bin earns 1 "productivity point" while putting it in the wrong bin, makes you lose 3. You have 90 seconds to earn as many productivity points as you can. Good luck!
